title: Door: Doors shall conform to the under mentioned provisions
clause_text: Door: Doors shall conform to the under mentioned provisions.In addition, in order to satisfy fire-fighting requirements, any doorway identified as an exit shall conform to the requirements stipulated in Regulation 47,
